title: Input Schema for iosmloader.
description: Input data model for a function block to load an (Indoor) Open Street Map data.

subgraphId.description: Optional subgraph ID. This is where the map will be added as a child node. If not specified, the root node will be taken.

fileName.description: Mandataory file name for the map to be loaded.

convertToUtm.description: Optional flag for pose data conversion. If true, every pose will be converted into the UTM representation. Dafault is false.
